See: EPA Cement Manufacturing Enforcement Initiative (https://www.epa.gov/enforcement/cement-manufacturing-enforcement-initiative ) for cement plant settlements that have required the installation of SNCR on a number of preheater, preheater/precaliner, and wet process cement kilns.
